arts.ttl: All 10 Premier League weekend games predictions - Week 5
arts.sum: The Premier League is back on Saturday and Sunday after the excitement of the midweek Champions League action and Phil Agius provides a score prediction for all 10 top-flight matches in England.

arts.ttl: Man United vs Chelsea: Premier League Preview, Matchday 5, 2025
arts.sum: Bryan Mbeumo hit 20 goals for Brentford in the Premier League last season, showing that there was life after Ivan Toney . The misery for Manchester United shows no signs of stopping this season with Ruben Amorim .

arts.ttl: Transfer Rumors: Man Utd Battle Barcelona for Vlahovic; Chelsea, Liverpool Want Van de Ven
arts.sum: Casemiro is considering leaving Man Utd when his contract expires next summer, having been enticed by an offer from Cristiano Ronaldo to join him at Saudi Arabian side Al Nassr. Dušan Vlahović is expected to leave Juventus when his contract expires next summer and has interest from Man Utd, Atlético Madrid and Barcelona .

arts.ttl: Another Palmer scare: Chelsea injury, suspension list vs. Man United
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up Chelsea’s injury and suspension list ahead of their Premier League clash with Manchester United.

arts.ttl: Man Utd warn fans over anti-gay chant vs. Chelsea
arts.sum: Manchester United have issued a warning to fans over their behavior when Chelsea visit Old Trafford on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Lammens debut decision: Predicted Man Utd lineup vs. Chelsea
arts.sum: Sports Mole takes an in-depth look at how Manchester United could line up for Saturday’s Premier League clash against Chelsea.

arts.ttl: Garnacho to start against former club: Predicted Chelsea lineup vs. Man Utd
arts.sum: Sports Mole takes an in-depth look at how Chelsea could line up for Saturday’s Premier League clash against Manchester United.
